Computer.name: Oblivion Digital Mainframe
Computer.file:
Uses of the blacklist:
Blocks the IP addresses entered from accessing any company servers, including the mail server and forum server
Any IP address inside the blacklist will need to go through moderation before being removed
The blacklist can also be used to aid the process of removing an employee from the system (in the case of retirement or being fired)
Only the current IT technician can gain access to the mainframe and therefore the blacklist ...which means that this document is useless :( !
